endpoints.description: Retrieve the list of all utility grids available for simulation and analysis.
Initiate a simulation for the specified grid to analyze operational performance under various conditions.
Retrieve all predefined and custom simulation scenarios.
Create a new scenario specifying expansion plans and load conditions.
Remove an existing simulation scenario by its ID.
Retrieve the results of a completed simulation by simulation ID.
Update the infrastructure data for a given grid before initiating simulations.
Run an optimization process to achieve load balancing for a specific grid configuration.
Access detailed reports and analytical data derived from past simulations.
Set up alert notifications for specific grid conditions or simulation parameters.
